titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the speedy putting in execution the late Act of Parliament for regulating the measures and prices of coals.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker, printers to the Kings most Excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: At end: Given at our Court at Whitehall the sixth day of March, 1664/5. in the seventeenth year of Our Reign.
Dates are given according to Lady Day dating.
Arms 66; Steele notation: the not; Counties or.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
